Craig-Spider-Ad-Builder-Tron
A time-saver

  • Back

I realized one day that craigslist ads could be made way prettier by adding a bit of HTML, so I made a small business for myself making custom ads and taking care of the day-to-day posting for a few car dealerships in the area.

Once I learned a bit of Ruby, I was able to create a little program that cut my work time by two thirds. It crawls through the web page I point it to, grabs the info I want, and formats it into something that will be nice to look at once I put it up on Craigslist.

Check it out on Github

Ad to Post
I run my code, which scrapes through the websites inventory pages...

Final Output
And this is what's spit out once the program runs
